product_overview: AI SmartChoice is a bilingual affiliate marketing platform that curates best-selling Amazon products using AI analysis of thousands of reviews. It offers a high-performance, modern, and responsive web experience in Arabic and English with seamless language toggling and premium product discovery.
core_goals: Provide an AI-curated selection of top Amazon products to save users time and improve their decision making.
Support full bilingual functionality with English (LTR) and Arabic (RTL) language support and easy toggling.
Deliver a modern, clean, and futuristic UI/UX with subtle glowing effects and high responsiveness.
Implement a rich product browsing experience with product grids, filtering, comparison, and detailed product views.
Enable affiliate conversions with clear call-to-action buttons opening Amazon links in new tabs.
Ensure SEO best practices for organic reach and discoverability.
key_features: Hero Section with a tagline "Stop Searching. Let AI Decide." displayed in English and Arabic with high-tech feel.
Responsive Product Grid that fetches products from Supabase and displays them as interactive product cards.
AI Verdict Badge on product cards indicating "AI Recommended" or a "98% Match" for curated trust.
Language Toggle Button prominently placed in the navbar for switching between English and Arabic interfaces.
SEO Optimization via proper meta tags, sitemap, JSON-LD structured data, and multilingual support.
Call to Action 'Buy Now' button on each product that opens the Amazon affiliate link in a new browser tab.
Product cards displaying product images, bilingual titles, an AI-generated summary, categories, and ratings.
Integration with Supabase as backend database storing product info with bilingual fields and affiliate links.
Use of Next.js 14 App Router, React 18, and Tailwind CSS for frontend architecture.
Setup of next-intl for seamless Arabic RTL and English LTR toggling.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage and sees the Hero Section with bilingual high-tech tagline.
User toggles language between English and Arabic using the navbar button, switching page content and directionality.
User browses products in the responsive grid and views AI Verdict badges on recommended items.
User clicks a product card to see more details or uses the 'Buy Now' button to visit Amazon in a new tab.
User navigates through filtered categories or searches for specific products with autocomplete support.
Users benefit from SEO optimized pages with metadata for better search rankings.
validation_criteria: Product grid loads and displays products from Supabase including bilingual text and images.
Language toggle switches all text and layout direction between English and Arabic correctly.
Hero Section tagline displays correctly in both languages with the intended style.
Each product card shows the AI Verdict badge when applicable with correct matching percentage or recommendation text.
Clicking 'Buy Now' opens the affiliate link in a new tab without errors.
SEO tags and schemas are correctly implemented and validate via SEO audit tools.
Database schema matches the specified columns and data types for bilingual content and functionality.
Supabase client helper connects and fetches data as expected without crashes.
Core components Navbar, Hero, and ProductCard render with correct props and functionality.
The next-intl configuration enables seamless locale switching and RTL/LTR adjustments.
